scripts.dev: concurrently -n "SERVER,CLIENT" -c "red,blue" "npm run dev -w server" "npm run dev -w client"
scripts.db+dev: npm run db:start -w server && concurrently -n "SERVER,CLIENT" -c "red,blue" "npm run dev -w server" "npm run dev -w client"
scripts.clean: concurrently -n "SERVER,CLIENT" -c "red,blue" "npm run clean -w server" "npm run clean -w client"
scripts.build: npm run prisma:generate -w server && concurrently -n "SERVER,CLIENT" -c "red,blue" "npm run build -w server" "npm run build -w client"
scripts.start: concurrently -n "SERVER,CLIENT" -c "red,blue" "npm run start -w server" "npm run preview -w client"
